languages.text: {n}Арджента глядит на вас немного удивленно.{/n} "Я считала, что была призвана, что найти корабль — мое предназначение... Место в мире? Может быть... может быть, в этом что-то есть".

traits.locale_text: {n}Арджента глядит на вас немного удивленно.{/n} "Я считала, что была призвана, что найти корабль — мое предназначение... Место в мире? Может быть... может быть, в этом что-то есть".
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta looks at you, somewhat surprised.{/n} "I thought that I had been called, that finding the ship was my destiny... My place in the world? Perhaps... perhaps there is something to that."

languages.text: {n}阿洁塔看着你，表情有些惊讶。{/n}“我以为我蒙受召唤，前往寻找这艘飞船就是我的命运……我在这个世界上的位置？或许……或许这个问题确实很值得思考。”
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta looks at you, somewhat surprised.{/n} "I thought that I had been called, that finding the ship was my destiny... My place in the world? Perhaps... perhaps there is something to that."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿洁塔看着你，表情有些惊讶。{/n}“我以为我蒙受召唤，前往寻找这艘飞船就是我的命运……我在这个世界上的位置？或许……或许这个问题确实很值得思考。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta te mira, sorprendida.{/n} «Creía que había sido llamada, que encontrar la nave era mi destino... ¿Mi lugar en el mundo? Tal vez tenga algo de razón en lo que dice».
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta looks at you, somewhat surprised.{/n} "I thought that I had been called, that finding the ship was my destiny... My place in the world? Perhaps... perhaps there is something to that."

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta te mira, sorprendida.{/n} «Creía que había sido llamada, que encontrar la nave era mi destino... ¿Mi lugar en el mundo? Tal vez tenga algo de razón en lo que dice».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}アルジェンタはやや驚いた様子であなたを見る。{/n}「我は呼ばれたのだと思いました。船を見つけることが我の運命なのだと…この惑星での我の居場所なのだと。もしかしたら…もしかしたら、何かがあるのかもしれない」
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta looks at you, somewhat surprised.{/n} "I thought that I had been called, that finding the ship was my destiny... My place in the world? Perhaps... perhaps there is something to that."

traits.locale_text: {n}アルジェンタはやや驚いた様子であなたを見る。{/n}「我は呼ばれたのだと思いました。船を見つけることが我の運命なのだと…この惑星での我の居場所なのだと。もしかしたら…もしかしたら、何かがあるのかもしれない」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta sieht dich überrascht an.{/n} "Ich dachte tatsächlich, mich hätte ein Ruf ereilt, dass es mein Schicksal war, das Schiff zu finden ... Aber meinen Platz in der Welt? Vielleicht ... vielleicht ist da sogar etwas dran."
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta looks at you, somewhat surprised.{/n} "I thought that I had been called, that finding the ship was my destiny... My place in the world? Perhaps... perhaps there is something to that."

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta sieht dich überrascht an.{/n} "Ich dachte tatsächlich, mich hätte ein Ruf ereilt, dass es mein Schicksal war, das Schiff zu finden ... Aber meinen Platz in der Welt? Vielleicht ... vielleicht ist da sogar etwas dran."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta vous lance un regard surpris.{/n} « J'ai pensé que j'avais été appelée, que mon destin était de trouver ce vaisseau... Ma place dans le monde ? Maintenant que vous le dites... il y a peut-être de ça aussi. »
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta looks at you, somewhat surprised.{/n} "I thought that I had been called, that finding the ship was my destiny... My place in the world? Perhaps... perhaps there is something to that."

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta vous lance un regard surpris.{/n} « J'ai pensé que j'avais été appelée, que mon destin était de trouver ce vaisseau... Ma place dans le monde ? Maintenant que vous le dites... il y a peut-être de ça aussi. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta, şaşkınlık içinde sana bakıyor.{/n} "Bu görevin beni çağırdığını düşünmüştüm, gemiyi bulmanın kaderim olduğunu... Neydi o? Evrendeki yerimi bulmak mıydı? Belki haklılık payın vardır."
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta looks at you, somewhat surprised.{/n} "I thought that I had been called, that finding the ship was my destiny... My place in the world? Perhaps... perhaps there is something to that."
